code: export var loginUser=function loginUser(email,password){return fetch("http://localhost:5000/users?email=".concat(email,"&password=").concat(password)).then(function(r){return r.json();}).then(function(v){if(v.length===1)return v[0];throw new Error("");});};export var registerUser=function registerUser(email,password){var createdAt=new Date().toISOString();return fetch("http://localhost:5000/users",{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({email:email,password:password,createdAt:createdAt})}).then(function(r){return r.json();});};
